content: W: Hey, did you manage to finish the project report last night? M: Yeah, but it was tough. I had to stay up really late.

items.stem: What can be inferred about the man?

options.C: He worked late to complete the task.

analysis.topic: 对所听内容做出推断题
analysis.details: 原文："Yeah, but it was tough. I had to stay up really late." 译文："是的，但是很艰难。我不得不熬夜到很晚。" 说明：男士提到完成报告很艰难并且熬夜完成，可以推断他工作到很晚才完成任务。
